summary: This document is a collection of IRS and JPMorgan Chase records related to the incorporation and banking setup for 'AIR GHISLAINE INC'. It includes an IRS notice accepting its S-Corporation election effective January 28, 2000, an Employer Identification Number assignment notice, and JPMorgan Private Bank account application forms for 'The Morgan Account'.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her name appears as part of the corporate entity 'AIR GHISLAINE INC' and is listed as an authorized signer on JPMorgan account application resolutions.

events.title: S-Corporation Election Effective
events.description: The IRS accepted the election for AIR GHISLAINE INC to be treated as an S-Corporation, effective January 28, 2000.

events.title: EIN Assignment
events.description: The IRS assigned Employer Identification Number 13-4109791 to AIR GHISLAINE INC.

keyFacts: The corporate entity 'AIR GHISLAINE INC' was established as an S-Corporation with an effective date of January 28, 2000.
The IRS assigned EIN 13-4109791 to AIR GHISLAINE INC on April 14, 2000.
JPMorgan Chase documents show account application resolutions for 'The Morgan Account' linked to this corporate entity.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as an authorized signer on the corporate banking resolutions.
